website_summaries.verdict: Consistent heat, a large cooking surface, and easy cleanup make this grill a favorite with families.
pros: Keeps consistent heat using master temperature control
Leaves grill marks and does not dry out food
cons: Some feel it takes a long time to heat up to temperature

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad At All
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Watch out on temperature. It tends to provide burn/grill marks faster than I would like. Easy to clean and perfect size for indoor grilling. Using it about twice a weed to grill vegis, chickens, and fish. The Chicken is harder, takes lots of time to cook well, unless you cut into small pieces. The fish cooks nicely and does not come out dry. I have not tried the steak yet. Overall, having good experience with this grill.
customer_reviews.author: The Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Not new, but secondhand
customer_reviews.text: Clearly was used and broken before we got it. I don't know how they're allowed to sell it as a "New" item when it's clearly already cut open, badly wrapped with layers of packing tape, and with one of the table legs itself completely broken off - it can't stand straight on its own much less if we were to grill something on it. Thought it was a good value but you're really just paying for the risk and now we don't have a grill ready in time.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Used it for kbbq!!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this with the intention of recreating the art of doing my own kbbq at home and let me just say, it did its work! It’s very simple to operate, the drip pan was easy to remove, and washing it after use was a breeze (I washed it in the sink and followed the instructions). Although the power cord is short, using an extension cord was fine; I had no issues in doing so. I was surprised to see that it was able to hold a good amount of food to be grilled! Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GRILL FOR WINTER AND RAINY DAYS!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use when I can't grill outside. Works great for burgers and Italian sausages, and also asparagus spears. Easy to clean with soap and water, rinse and wipe clean with a paper towel. I use it on a smooth cooktop under the vent fan. It does spatter, so I place a reusable piece of foil underneath to help with cleanup. For thicker burgers, I cover them with a foil tent to hold in the heat so they cook better in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Worked great- saved our night- catering
customer_reviews.text: We had a last minuet BIG FANCY EXPENSIVE catering thrown on our laps a few weeks before Christmas. They wanted a demonstrative cooking station incorporated into the meal. I had little time to plan a menu, let alone order equipment. We ended up doing shrimp kabobs and grilling them on this. It created very little smoke. The oils dropped neatly into the drip pan, and it was going all night. The temperature stayed consistent, the food was good, the guests were happy and it was super easy to dismantle & clean at an off site event.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. R

customer_reviews.title: Can get very hot and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Can get very hot and easy to clean. It has large surface so that you have lot of area to cook on. Used 2 days in a row. The spatula that comes with it is really helpful on this grill. Make sure to clean and dry right away to prevent rust possibility.
customer_reviews.author: Kenshin Vu

customer_reviews.title: Not great for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had tried cooking steaks on it sooner... I would return this if the return window wasn't closed. It isn't a bad product, but I definitely wouldn't recommend it for indoor use for beef. This thing smoked like crazy with both hamburger and steak. The grease doesn't drain off well, and splatters everywhere. The max temperature isn't really high enough to cook a steak well either. Might be ok for other things but if you are looking to cook beef inside, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth B Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my family love korean food! This is the best indoor grill ever. Delivered it a day early as scheduled.The heat is even, it easily gets hot, easy to clean and use. Perfect size. Super love it!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for me! Purchased some wagyu burgers from Walmart, sous vide them using my Aldis (Ambiano) sous vide system. Took this out of the box, washed it, sprayed it down with olive oil, cranked it up to 400 F and seared the burgers after 2.5 hours at 135 F! Measured the temp and the grill achieved 450F. It was consistent across the surface! Fantastic! If there are any issues with it later I’ll update this review. I purchased this outright and did not receive any compensation for it. I’ve always had good luck with Presto products and don’t anticipate any issues with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Walter

customer_reviews.title: nice Indoor BBQ
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely BBQ Grill, however, the size is a little small than described. It looks like 2 people's serving size. The Temperature somehow lost connection, you have to plug in hardly then, make sure it connects well. When I use it over a few times, seems it became easier to lost power connection. Besides that, It is easy to clean and easy to set-up. But we have to keep clean the BBQ waste during cooking, otherwise, meat is easy to be overcooked. Overall, Compare with its price and quality, this is a good BBQ Product! I will recommend small family to buy one for Indoor BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas, our other one was worn out. This one is so much easier to clean. Cooks food nicely. The grill coating is so much better then our old one. Price was good. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a nice countertop grill.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Ackerman-Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this grill. It’s so easy to use and clean!!! I grilled 4 burger patties with plenty of room. And the burgers came out so delicious. Literally tasted like it came right from a real grill. Totally recommend. Great price for what you’re getting.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a year ago and it’s still working great! We use it probably once a week, if not definitely every other week, and have never had a problem with it! Easy to clean, easy to store and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Buying my 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: I last bought this in 2014.. and I just finally got rid of it and now buying another one exactly the same. I have been using it at least once a week for the past 4 years. It works really well and it fits my shish kebabs perfectly. Very happy with this product. Very easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: jgb

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for the money!
customer_reviews.text: We like to cook our thinly slice meat on the grill at the table. This grill serves the purpose. The angle could be steeper so the oil rolls down more, so we made 2 little knobs that we put under 2 corners at the top. The temperature is not uniform on the grill, but once you get used to where is hot and where is cooler, then you get used to to move around your meat and cook.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: i have had this a long time i love it ordered it for my friend cuz she wants one and she loves it to they have a long life it cooks really good i have had mine over 7 years and still counting love this product a must have in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: chocolatemint2002

customer_reviews.title: Good product worth having
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today tested it out works fine love how light weight it is and that it came with some accessories. I’m pleased with this purchase. Quality is very good, looking forward to use this as I rarely eat fired food. I don’t have an outdoor space to grill In the backyard but even if I did I would have still invested in an indoor grill.
customer_reviews.author: khalia Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Small Electric Grill
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little grill. We live in a condo that only allows electric grills and i had been really craving a grilled burger. This grill did the job. There was a lot of splatter but i out it on a plastic tablecloth. Burgers had grill marks and i didn’t have to mess my stove. Still would prefer a gas grill but sometimes ya do what you do.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D

customer_reviews.title: Easy, easy, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has always done the cooking, but I thought I would try to help out. This grill has been perfect for me, easy to use and very easy to clean. It's not too large, but is great for two people. I have grilled meat, fish, veggies, and the grill does a really nice job with a minimum of hassle. Easily 5 stars for me.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick G. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Indoor Grilling
customer_reviews.text: I love to grill out but winters in central Illinois can really put a damper on that. The product takes time to get used to as it is much slower than an outdoor grill, but it works just fine for an occasional steak or burgers in winter. It's grilled, but you just don't get quite the flavor you normally get from a real grill. Much better, though, than pan frying. The surface is very easy to clean and you don't get a lot of smoke or spatter produced as the fat is drained away from the meat.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Marek

customer_reviews.title: Love this😍😍
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeeeeee This Grill..🥰🥰🥰 This Grill is #Life lol.. Is so Easy to Clean and cooking is a Breeze. It Cooks wonderful no smoke in my house you should smell the flavors. Anyone who is contemplating on buying this is my best advice is don't hesitate this is money well spent💸💸💸💸
customer_reviews.author: Coco Medina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for the month of Ramadan as I fry chicken meats almost everyday for my fast breaking meal. And I find it very easy to use and clean, it doesn't stick too which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Abderrahim boukbir

customer_reviews.title: This grill is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most useful kitchen appliance I have bought in a long time. Next to my KitchenAid and Cuisinart food processor. It reigns supreme. Especially nice for just the two of us instead of firing up the huge gas grill. Are use it at least once a day!
customer_reviews.author: GRANNY KKC

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this grill! So far I have grilled steak and chicken and it came out great. I like the fact that the grill gets hot enough to sear the meat. I would definitely recommend. Bon appetit. :)
customer_reviews.author: MiddernachtTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just replaced my old electric grill with this Presto. Used it last night to grill salmon & it was perfection. It is so nice to have the temperature Control & a non-stick surface which my old grill didn’t have. Clean up was very fast and easy. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann H

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Sorry for the late riview. But anyways this product is amazing. Its perfect for our family. Coz we loved grilling so much. Its easy to clean. Steak$ is perfect! Highly recommended. Buying one again for a friend coz she really loves it. They saw my griller when they came over for a visit. 10/10. Fast delivery too! Ps. We used these right away when it got delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle t.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Korean BBQ
customer_reviews.text: My GF bought this solely to do Korean BBQ. I was weary at first, but it seemed to really work. Now it is my favorite meal and is used at least once a week. I can't speak for anything else but for this use it rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Kebron

customer_reviews.title: DAUGHTER LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my 40 year old daughter. She constantly raves about it and can't wait for the next time she has to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Indoor Grill
customer_reviews.text: Excellent alternative to grilling outside! Works better than the George Foreman grill! Very good price! Presto, you are excellent at what you do!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This grill really works. It has perfectly cooked chicken thighs, hamburgers, even marinated tofu. It has a large surface and will hold six chicken breasts. It comes with a spatula that slides in the surface grooves for easy picking up. Food does not stick to it and it cleans easily with a sponge. The light on the heat control goes off when desired temperature has been reached. It seems well made and sturdy. I place it on my flat stove-top so I can turn the overhead suction fan on. So far, only a week, I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: SharLu

customer_reviews.title: More Power, Scotty!  Can't Grill Hotdogs In a Reasonable Time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily for grilling hot dogs as I like the grilled taste. This grill provides that, but not in a reasonable time. It takes way too long. Otherwise it is fine, but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Grognard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect indoor grill!
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to use - and even easier to clean up. Steak came out perfect - minimal smoke too. I set it on the stove top and turned on the oven fan, but didn't even need to. Tonight's dinner - terikyaki chicken, grilled zucchini and grilled peaches!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Raulerson

customer_reviews.title: Easy bbq!
customer_reviews.text: This indoor grill is so easy to use, put together, and clean. I was able to grill kbbq, hamburgers, and hot dogs at home just fine! All my food cooked thoroughly and evenly. The grill's ridges leave nice, even grill marks on my bbq too.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne M

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! When I'm just cooking for myself or don't feel like pulling the grill out, this is my go-to appliance! I mainly due zucchini and chicken on it, but I am so glad that I purchased it. I have a George Foreman, but find that the heat on the top and bottom at the same time was drying things out (maybe I just don't do it properly). With this, my chicken is always juicy and my veggies also taste much better than pan frying them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. Got it for mother's day and I love it. I throw my fish on here, my vegetables, anything. I only wish it came with a griddle extension so I could make pancakes and stuff. Instead the griddle must be bought separate so you end up with 2 of these instead of 1.
customer_reviews.author: D DORIVAL

customer_reviews.title: A pleasure to grill indoors!
customer_reviews.text: Great grill for the price! Plenty of room to cook for 4, I cook for 2 and there's room for 2 good size steaks. I cooked 4 large burgers and they were delicious! Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time today and it worked great . Flavor was perfect. I notice the plug is a little wobbly but it snaps in and works like a charm . Unit seems really sturdy and easy to clean .
customer_reviews.author: deedee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing grill
customer_reviews.text: Amazing grill. I have owned several in the past but this one is by far the best! Easy to clean and cooks to perfection. I am very happy that I went with this one and got an awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: salewa Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just one minor issue, it needs to be elevated in one end this way the grease run down the tray
customer_reviews.author: Demetrio Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Box it
customer_reviews.text: I love it I love it I used it as soon as it came the parties with the girls are about to be a blast since we all love to cook the only thing is they didn’t box my package if I wasn’t working from home and a thing like this was sitting on my porch it would’ve been gone please box the package
customer_reviews.author: Monymonae

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Got food poisoning from eating raw meat... not the grill’s fault. 100% my own fault. This is a good grill. Would have been great if it told me to cook the meat longer.
customer_reviews.author: spider-man

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: 1. It heats fast 2. Non stick 3. Super easy to use and clean 4. Meat frying in it's own grease, makes everything taste absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: good could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize the grill not being detached would be a pain to clean, temperture did is misleading, hard to figure the temperature. Otherwise cooks very well.
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: Home KBBQ made easy!
customer_reviews.text: Best investment I’ve made during quarantine! Cooks meats evenly and easy to clean! Fat drips down the channels into a collection tray!
customer_reviews.author: Thaeyo

customer_reviews.title: and immediately in love with it
customer_reviews.text: Saw friends using this when we got invited for dinner, and immediately in love with it. We use it to cook korean style BBQ and the oil/drip pan is great for catching the grease, and the included grease scraper fits perfectly into the grooves to remove the grease into the drip pan. Remove the tempreature control unit, the entire thing is dishwasher safe for easy cleaning. Heats up fast as well. Highly recommended for your next indoor grilling party.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAholic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect griddle for KBBQ
customer_reviews.text: This is my second griddle. This is perfect for Korean bbq at your house. Heats up super fast and hot. Perfect for indoor use. The nonstick surface helps with the clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ninh

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products on the market! I don’t even use my stove anymore. Very easy to clean and it’s not simply for grilled food use. I LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.author: V V

customer_reviews.title: Great grilling
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. It is so easy to use and clean up is a breeze. Everything goes right into the dishwasher. Food turns out great every time. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great value great price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean. I use this little grill almost every day, its great!! The temperature setting is simple, and I easily cook for a family of 5 with it.
customer_reviews.author: felina hill

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use mine for steaks and burgers all the time. Meat comes out perfect. When done I unplug it and place it in my sink and rinse off with hot water. It's that easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor grilling option
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so we didn't have to battle to get a grill down by the pool or have to buy charcoal and deal with getting it lit. This product is perfect! It's a great size, heats up quickly, and stays a constant temperature throughout cooking. We were able to put two pretty good sized boneless ribeye steaks on here along with a whole bunch of halved baby carrots. Cleaning it is easy as long as you do it while it is still warm. I just took a damp paper towel and wiped it down carefully and BAM clean.
customer_reviews.author: Smasharina

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like an outdoor grill !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this indoor grill!! It makes meat and veggies taste amazing, like it was made on an outdoor grill. I bought 1 for a family member as a gift then I ended up buying a 2nd one for myself!! The grill is so easy to clean and it comes with a really nice spatula
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Good for cooking meats!
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I thought the grill part was able to come off because I wanted to cook other things on it like pancakes and stuff like that, but the grill part doesn’t come off...
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! I am cooking almos everything there!!' Easy to use!! Heats pretty fast and easy to clean!! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Valderene

customer_reviews.title: This product is simply a pain
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pain to clean, gets hot on one side and not the other. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, useful, but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: you pay for what you get. It is cheap, and it doesn't have good quality. Clean is a serious problem after cooking since oil just splashed everywhere. Also the tray is really hard to clean
customer_reviews.author: Rainus

customer_reviews.title: Best grill ever
customer_reviews.text: Super light, portable, heats quickly, and very convenient to use anywhere. THE EASIEST CLEAN. Most of the food comes off with a hot rinse. Scrubbing is very minimum. Love this grill. You can cook anything on it. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chap Mafate

customer_reviews.title: Really good grill
customer_reviews.text: Have used this once and really liked how it grilled boneless skinless chicken breasts. The food looked just like it came off my propane grill (nice grill sear marks) and chicken was really moist. Did not heat up the kitchen like the gas range oven. There was some splatter, but no more than if I pan grilled the chicken breasts. Just put it where you don't mind a little bit of splatter. Wish I had bought it sooner. Oh yeah, cleans up perfectly in my dishwasher on the lower rack, including the drip pan.
customer_reviews.author: MKM

customer_reviews.title: Nice winter option.
customer_reviews.text: Great for winter! Does smoke but I put it under my exhaust fan above the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome appliance
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Simple to clean and the hot dogs, steak, chicken, shrimp, veggies all taste awesome!
customer_reviews.author: allenxexo

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I bought it for my summer home. It is great for rainy days so I don't have to go outside to grill. It's also great for days when I don't want to spend time waiting for the charcoals to get ready or I don't have a lot to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy E Sankowski

customer_reviews.title: Kbbq night
customer_reviews.text: Uses this for my family kbbq night, and it works great!! The cord is a little short, but nothing an extension cord won’t fix. Easy to clean! I just put some foil in the grease collection to catch the oil.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Kwok

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review
customer_reviews.text: I love this so far. I have another indoor flat top grill but I like the fact this one makes nice lines on your food. This one is best for meats and not items like pancakes or eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Grill for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent indoor grill that is great for any kind of food to grill. Heats quickly and dies get very hit. Just be careful. Grills evenly. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: E. Homer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I'm very pleased with this item. I wish I had purchased this years ago!!
customer_reviews.author: NiNa

customer_reviews.title: It does the job!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. Now we can do grilling, bbq’n indoor. Plug it and set to go. There still smoke but a light one coming from a drying Water or oil.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Good but lack functionality
customer_reviews.text: Works well with very even heating, however I wished it had some type of timer because I had to guess when I should turn the meat or vegetable over when grilling. .
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor grill!!
customer_reviews.text: I use my grill a lot and just love it. It's easy to clean. I like being able to grill indoors. So far, I have tried marinated chicken, salmon, steak, and shrimp. Yum!!
customer_reviews.author: Tacy L.

customer_reviews.title: It delivers on its mission
customer_reviews.text: simple, easy to use and clean up. Not fancy, just what we wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Brad R

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick makes cleaning a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I'm unable to grill outdoors as I live in an apartment and don't have a balcony so of course this was the next best thing. The non-stick surface makes it super easy to clean. The only downfall of the product is that it doesn't have a lid so grease tends to splatter on the counter, although that's not really an issue for me. I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis T.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This is the best investment in my life. I told to so many friends that this is the best thing. They bought it and they are very happy. I can make feast with this. This is my second time buying it. I dropped it in the floor today and it was still working but I want back up :). Absolutely fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This little grill is pretty great. I used to have a nice 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This little grill is pretty great. I used to have a nice 4 burner outdoor gas grill, but after many moves and a smaller balcony, I had to make due with a cast iron grill pan. I loved the sear but it smoked and was impossible to clean. This electric grill heats up fast, emits little smoke, grills meat and veggies quite well, and cleans up SO easily. I made teriyaki porkchops and grilled veggies last night, and the teriyaki sauce, despite being sugary and sticky and ruining a non-stick skillet of mine, came off with no effort whatsoever. I'm very impressed, especially given the price point, and it's a great addition to an apartment (or house) kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My roommates love this BBQ grill
customer_reviews.text: My roommates really love this BBQ grill. From now on we can have fresh grill BBQ everyday. It is super convenient and portable, good for camping as long as there is a plugin.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and used it right away for a burger. Amazing... 1. Heats up quickly 2. Easy to clean 3. Doesn’t smoke
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMadeMeDoIt

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: We bought one and after a number of uses she dropped it on the floor. She was upset with herself and I immediately ordered a replacement. We recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lailheugue

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Nice little grill. Cooks well and evenly with not too much smoke. Kind of wish if could go higher in temperature but understand why it doesn't. Satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: minseven

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This was an item that I wasn't sure I needed considering I have a nice outdoor grill as well as a cast iron grill pan. Boy was I wrong. I use this sucker at least once a week (sometimes even in warm weather where I could go outside but just choose to use this instead). It cleans easily, the temperature is even, awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: It is is so easy to use and the clean-up is a cinch. I haven't tried the dishwasher, even though it says you can, but it cleans so easily with a soapy sponge, there's no need. It keep a nice even temperature which you set and it's large enough for 3 or 4 hamburgers or chicken breasts. I was afraid it would smoke, but it doesn't. We really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol12345

customer_reviews.title: PRESTO indeed!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little grill but I only use it outdoors. Great for seafood. burgers. chicken skewers etc. I ordered a second one as a spare and sent another to my daughter, who absolutely loves it. Very easy to clean since it is absolutely non stick.
customer_reviews.author: Gerb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product now in excess of 15 times. I ordered the Grill to cook steaks and chops that exceed space constraints of a 12" fry pan. the Teflon coating still looks like brand new and everything works properly. Since it is used at least twice per week, I'm sure that It will wear out in due course. At that time, I'll simply buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great indoor grill! I have cooked turkey burgers, sausage, veggies, and fruits on this grill. They all come out just as they would on an outdoor grill. I am extremely pleased with this grill. I like the tray that can catch run off juice. I used it in a hotel once and it set off the fire alarm it gave off so much heat. There is a dial so you can adjust the amount of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: This product is simply amazing. Minimal smell for an indoor grill, heats up quickly and is easy to clean. Big enough to serve 2+ and amazing value for money. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: This is a great grill!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this use indoors for those times I didn’t want to drag the outdoor grill out. It’s very easy to use, I’ve had no problems with it smoking and clean up is a snap. I’ve used it several times with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Presto grill
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill. I really don't understand why anyone would complain about it. I used a pan cover to cover my steak while cooking Read the instructions and if you follow them and preheat like it says your food will brown and cook evenly. Very easy clean up. I washed mine by hand because I didn't want to run the risk of discoloration by putting it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Maria

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Used this one time. It worked great. Next time, wouldn't heat up. Oops! Need to update. Found out that I used a different cord from another presto product I had. It wouldn't heat up, so I thought it was broken. Although the cord from this griddle heats up my presto electric pan!! So my mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie M. Mauzac

customer_reviews.title: Good, simple home cooking grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill is quite practical to use to do some home cooking grill. The only drawback is that you can't take out the grill apart to wash it. Other than that, the wife loves it. Happy wife, happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ross

customer_reviews.title: Very small, put the extra money in to get something good
customer_reviews.text: Too small, I’m giving it to my son for college. I didn’t even use it yet. I’d rather spend the Extra money and get something that’s big enough to make a meal for more than 1 person .
customer_reviews.author: S. Scalafani

customer_reviews.title: I’m Glad I purchased this grill it’s Perfect for grilled food
customer_reviews.text: I Love this , Ive been using this Almost everyday
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Do the job but careful when cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times seems to do the job just fine - have to be careful cleaning it as the grill cannot be removed for cleaning and it's connected to the electrical part. No problem so far just have to be careful. Price is right!!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Must for grilling when cold
customer_reviews.text: Great for grilling inside when too cold to grill outside. This is my second one loved the first so much. Could be a little easier to clean but ok.
customer_reviews.author: lesley

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I use it at least one a week. Chicken, veggies, steaks, hotdogs.
customer_reviews.author: heathert

customer_reviews.title: what a great product! I just received this today and used ...
customer_reviews.text: Greetings All, WOW, what a great product! I just received this today and used it to grill veggies. Did a awesome job, can't wait to try other things! Easy to clean, really holds a lot of food! If your looking for a indoor grill, look no further! The best! Cheers! William
customer_reviews.author: William E. Bondar Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it can do.
customer_reviews.text: It really does make the food taste like it had been grilled and is very easy to clean afterwards. I’ve done Salmon, halibut , Turkey sausage and some vegetables , Very happy with it,
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Mielke

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: we needed something to cook Bacon and other meats on in the kitchen, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Drainer storage is useless
customer_reviews.text: It works good. The only thing I am giving less that five stars is because of the drainer. It is loose and It is falling every time I move the grill. The good think is that It have not been full so when it fells to make mess on the floor. Well I just remove it
customer_reviews.author: Sofiya L

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a little kitchen area and so far have not been disappointed with my item.
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY SALVIDO

customer_reviews.title: So easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. As good as the 100$ plus machines. I had quit trying to cook pork chops as I usually overcooked them.`With this grill I'm cooking them twice a week to perfection. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and clean up in a snap!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this grill! Cooked steak tonight 1 1/2 in thick! It was perfect medium rare! Also grilled onion sliced with just a little olive oil. Perfect with grill marks. Washed clean in the sink nothing was stuck on it! I would sure order one again!
customer_reviews.author: Florida sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a korean bbq party I had and it was great! Very little to no smoke and it was really easy to clean. I just used a damp dish cloth and wah-lah all clean
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Indoor Grill
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill and have used it to cook everything! So easy to clean and I mostly just stick it in the dishwasher. I think the outer sides of the grill get hotter than the center so I just make sure to rotate my food. Overall very satisfied and I've purchased one as a gift for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

product_meta.title: Presto 09020 Cool Touch Electric Indoor Grill
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1Premium nonstick 16-Inch raised grid cooking surface for stick-free cooking and easy cleaning. 120 volts, 60 Hz only
feature_bullets: Grease automatically drains from food into drip tray
Cool touch base surrounds the grilling surface on the front & back sides
Control Master heat control maintains the proper cooking temperature automatically
Fits in most dishwashers & standard 18" kitchen cabinets

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars878 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Presto 09020 Cool Touch Electric Indoor Grill
